-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Template-Haskell helpers for integrating protobufs with persistent.
--   
--   Template-Haskell helpers for integrating protobufs with persistent.
@package persistent-protobuf
@version 0.1.5


-- | <a>derivePersistFieldPB</a> uses Template Haskell to produce
--   <a>PersistField</a> instances for types with <a>ReflectDescriptor</a>
--   and <a>Wire</a> instances just as <a>derivePersistField</a> produces
--   <a>PersistField</a> instances for types with <a>Read</a> and
--   <a>Show</a> instances.
module Database.Persist.TH.ProtocolBuffers

-- | Derive <a>PersistField</a> instances for <tt>typName</tt>.
--   <tt>typName</tt> should be an instance of the <a>ReflectDescriptor</a>
--   and <a>Wire</a> classes.
derivePersistFieldPB :: String -> Q [Dec]
